thread.title: Falcons coach: 'No concern' over Julio Jones' injured foot
thread.title_full: Falcons coach: 'No concern' over Julio Jones' injured foot

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Falcons coach: 'No concern' over Julio Jones' injured foot
text:
Falcons coach: 'No concern' over Julio Jones' injured foot Jones had 6 catches for 67 yards in the Falcons' win Saturday night. Post to Facebook Falcons coach: 'No concern' over Julio Jones' injured foot Jones had 6 catches for 67 yards in the Falcons' win Saturday night.  //usat.ly/2ixOaxs   Falcons coach: 'No concern' over Julio Jones' injured foot USA TODAY Sports Published 8:34   | Updated 9 minutes ago Atlanta Falcons wide receiver Julio Jones (11) runs after a catch against the Seattle Seahawks during the second quarter in the NFC Divisional playoff at Georgia Dome. (Photo: Dale Zanine, USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
There was concern when Falcons receiver Julio Jones left the NFC Divisional match against the Seahawks early, bothered again by his foot injury. 
No worries, said coach Dan Quinn after Atlanta's victory over Seattle. 
Quinn said there is “no concern” Jones will be good to go in next week’s NFC Championship game. 
Jones had 6 catches for 67 yards on Saturday night. Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed.
